tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly. thank you to all the doctors for being there to fight during this global pandemic. As we all know this pandemic has affected each one of us in some way. 
Thank you Dr. Ramit for being so friendly and for giving healthy diet advices. The way you advised felt like you‚Äôre a very honest person with outmost humanity, loving & caring. Thank you for the diet chart which you shared that‚Äôs so beneficial and easy to understand which vegetables or products provide what vitamins.
Apologies for reaching late once again. But thank you so much for understanding the situation we were in. 
Lastly, thank you Mr. Sanjay the most helpful person. since the time I have booked an appointment Mr. Sanjay made sure that we get to the location safely. 
I recommend everyone to book an appointment without giving a second thought as trust me it is worth it. Such generosity and humbleness isn‚Äôt found these day. 
I wish you all the best and please be the person that you are always. Thank you once again. Stay safe üëç
reply_text: Thanks alot for such kind words ! Wish you best of health. üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I was suffering from loose motions. I took some remedial measures at home. My condition didn‚Äôt improve and frequency of rushing to the toilet increased. I was dehydrated.My wife realised that home treatment won‚Äôt work . She decided to take me to Rxpert Clinic. We had heard of Dr Ramit Sambyal as he enjoyed good reputation in our society.
Dr Ramit listened to my problem very patiently and examined me in details. He immediately understood the problem and quickly administered fluids as I was loosing water in my body. Antibiotics were also infected with the fluids.He detained me in the clinic for about four hours After that I was feeling much better. During this period,Dr Ramit was very friendly and proved his medical acumen. His approach toward his patients is very professional and caring.
I feel totally impressed by Dr Ramit and strongly recommend to patients to consult Dr Ramit for any ailment or during emergencies.
Good luck to Dr Ramit Sambyal
reply_text: Thanks for such nice response! üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Ramit listened patiently and explained my condition. I am still undergoing treatment as covid takes time to break up with you. Doctor has divided the whole medicine schedule in a way so that it doesn't burden me and scares me off. 
I wasn't sure if I was really infected by covid until I lost my sense of smell and taste. But thankfully I had started my medication before that because doctor identified my symptoms.
reply_text: Thanks alot for the kind words... Speedy recovery!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My husband was having fever from 7 days ..we connected to Dr Ramit on practo app.
He was very friendly and patient and helped us understand covid and symptoms. He suggested us with few tests and due to correct diagnosis on time , we were saved from being hospitalized. 
Also here I would like to mention that he was always available on chat and responded to all our questions which I liked the most.
I would highly recommend this doctor to everyone
reply_text: Wish him speedy recovery! üôèüôè

 Thank you dr.ramit singh provided **** treatment to my father

review:
Doc was my assigned to me over Practo.. he was very reassuring, as I was freaking out coz of my stomach and back pain.. he was very thorough in asking my symptoms, medical history, general details, dietary details.. recommended me USG and prescribed meds, which I hope will work.. but the best part of the consultation was that he calmed me down when I was freaking out coz am all alone in this city and under the codition.
Thank you so much, Doc
reply_text: Thanks anwiksha! Follow the advise and don't panic , rest nothing to worry!

review: So...Dr. Ramit was assigned as my on call doc because I needed a consultation for my blood tests done earlier today. He was very patient, addressed the issues very promptly and helped me understand the diagnosis properly. I was a bit anxious on the reports but he made me laugh and provided me with detailed prescription along with diet recommendations. Thankyou so much doc. And a big applaud for helping us out in these tough times. Thankyou :)
reply_text: Thanks alot for such kind words. Follow the diet and the medication! More than the medication the diet and lifestyle modification will solve your problem!
